content: आमृश् {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To touch; handle (roughly), lay hands upon; नवातपामृष्टसरोजचारुभिः <ls>Ki. 4. 14</ls>; (तां) मुहुरामृशन्मृगधरोऽग्रकरैः <ls>Śi. 9. 34</ls>; शरासनज्यां मुहुराममर्श <ls>Ku. 3. 64</ls>; <ls>K. 163</ls>; <ls>Dk. 71</ls>; <ls>Ś. 7. 2.</ls> {@--2@} ({%a%}) To seize upon, eat up; <ls>R. 5. 9.</ls> ({%b%}) To attack, assail; आमृष्टं नः परैः पदं <ls>Ku. 2. 31.</ls> {@--3@} To rub, injure.
